meanings.definition: A traditional German stew made with rabbit meat, onions, and a variety of spices.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother makes delicious hasenpfeffers for our family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served hasenpfeffers with a side of mashed potatoes.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled hasenpfeffers on my shirt, and now it smells amazing!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of simmering hasenpfeffers filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The rich flavors of the hasenpfeffers lingered on my taste buds long after the meal.

meanings.sent5: As the pot simmered, the enticing smell of hasenpfeffers filled the kitchen.
